title: Executive Order 12814-Additions to Level IV of the Executive Schedule for Members of the Chemical Safety and Hazard Investigation Board
content: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, including section 5317 of title 5 of the United States Code, and in order to place additional positions in Level IV of the Executive Schedule, section 1-101 of Executive Order No. 12154, as amended, is hereby further amended by adding the following new subsection:
[NAME], Chemical Safety and Hazard Investigation Board (5).
citation: George Bush, Executive Order 12814-Additions to Level IV of the Executive Schedule for Members of the Chemical Safety and Hazard Investigation Board Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/268865
